timeline_and_milestones.highlight: End of February: Preliminary repricing numbers needed for backward compatibility analysis
End of February: All tooling ready including BALL optimizations and Fusaka fork support
End of March: Final repricing numbers and definitive BALL integration complete
April: Testing, security analysis, and community issue resolution phase

compute_repricing_eip7904.highlight: EIP-7904 downscoped to 13 operations performing worse than 60 Mgas/s
Price reductions removed; focus only on underperforming bottleneck operations
Numbers still preliminary: awaiting Fusaka fork runs and BALL optimizations
POINT_EVALUATION increase impacts blob base fee floor calculation

state_growth_eip8037.highlight: CREATE regular gas cost needs definition beyond bundled GasCreate constant
SSTORE update vs insert may need different regular gas costs
Transaction max gas limit should enforce intrinsic regular gas upfront
Receipt fields: cumulative_gas_used semantics unclear with state gas split
Refund mechanism currently unchanged; applies to sum of regular+state gas

failure_modes_analysis.highlight: Failure mode 1: Regular gas bottleneck causes lower state creation (acceptable)
Failure mode 2: State gas bottleneck underutilizes compute and state access

calldata_pricing_eip7976.highlight: Proposal: Harmonize to 64/64 gas per byte at floor (vs 15/60)
Benefit: Delays 10MB limit from 150M gas to 650M gas
Impact analysis shows marginal user effect; comprehensive review needed

eth_transfer_pricing_eip2780.highlight: ETH transfer logs currently free due to overpriced transfers
Component-based repricing removes slack; log costs must be added explicitly

l2_coordination.highlight: OP Labs: DA costs and proof system implications are key divergence points
OP Labs requests benchmarking collaboration to deduplicate efforts
EEST benchmark suite being developed for generic EVM opcode testing

action_items.action: Align on best place to share benchmarking findings and tooling
Use EL testing channel on ETH R&D to coordinate benchmarking efforts
Create PR for 64/64 calldata pricing; finalize decision in 2 weeks

decisions.decision: EIP-8037 refund mechanism remains unchanged; applies to regular+state gas sum
EIP-2780 will add explicit log costs for ETH transfers (currently free)

targets.target: End of February 2026 - Preliminary repricing numbers and specs ready
End of March 2026 - Final repricing numbers with BALL integration
